page.title: 06Chesterfield Crematorium
page.content: Chesterfield & District Crematorium is situated about two miles to the north-east of the town near to Brimington. There are nine full-time staff and one part-time cleaner. Three of those employed work on the upkeep of the grounds which are kept in excellent condition with many rose beds and hundreds of trees dedicated to those who have been cremated there. Applications for cremation come from a wide area including Bakewell,Darley- Dale, Tideswell, Buxton, Mosborough, Harthill, Worksop, Alfreton & Belper. On average forty cremations are carried out each week giving an overall total of some two thousand each year. The cremation service is strictly limited to thirty minutes in order to maintain a fairly constant flow. A Book of Remembrance is on view and opened for each day of the year.
